meaningInfo: The <radical>fly</radical> radical and the <kanji>fly</kanji> kanji are exactly the same! Awesome!
readingInfo: When you <kanji>fly</kanji>, you generate a lot of <reading>he</reading>at (<ja>ひ</ja>) because you’re moving so fast through the atmosphere. Normally this heat would be a nuisance, but you’re a superhero so it doesn’t bother you. This is actually the reason you’re able to fly – you’re a superhero and super resistant to heat.
